quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"bloom"(开花)猜测为"开花相关事物"，或因拟声词"bloop"(杂音)误判为"杂音设备"。
quiz_item.sentence: The TV show aired a funny **blooper** reel from the movie set, where the actor accidentally tripped over his own lines and fell off the couch.

option.definition: （广播/电视中的）失误；闹笑话的事
开花的植物；盛开的花朵
勇敢的人；无畏的冒险者
